example.name: autogen1
example.text: last season 's champs , the Los Angeles Dodgers , who rode a miracle home run by Kirk Gibson and two faultless pitching performances by Orel Hershiser to a five-game triumph over a bewitched , bothered Oakland crew
example.arg: over a bewitched , bothered Oakland crew

example.name: autogen2
example.text: a triumph of either apathy or civility
